Angiography¶

class oct.Angiography(mode='cdv')¶

Bases: object

Angiography contrast OCT reconstruction

Methods

__init__([mode])

Initialize self.

cdv()

Compute angiography frames using the CDV algorithm .. note::.

cdv_nb()

Compute angiography frames using the CDV algorithm with noise-bias correction .. note::.

fixImageWidth()

If ramp scan patter angio is being used, we need to add a column to the data to make it equal to the other datasets.

formatAngioOut(angio)

Format the output angio array to Uint8, according to contrast settings

formatWeightOut(weight)

Format the output weight array to Uint8, according to contrast settings

initialize([data, settings, filterSize])

Initialize the angiography reconstruction with desired settings :param data: Support and raw data holder :type data: object :param settings: Manual input settings holder :type settings: dict :param filterSize: filter X & Z sizes :type filterSize: tuple

manageChannels()

Handle case where only channel 2’s are passed

reconstruct([tomch1, tomch2, data, settings])

Reconstruct an angiography contrast frame

requires()

Prints out the required/optional variables to perform reconstruction

setSettings([data, settings])

Sets the reconstruction settings for structural contrast Notes:
